channel.title: CVE Feed for webriti -- Busiprof
channel.description: The latest CVEs for webriti -- Busiprof

item.title: CVE-2024-43262|2024-09-13T13:29:41.277Z -- webriti -- busiprof
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in webriti Busiprof allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Busiprof: from n/a through 2.4.8.
